item.title: Getting started with Codename One
item.description: Installation & Setup # Installation # Installing Codename One In NetBeans # These instructions assume you have downloaded a recent version of NetBeans (at this time 8.x), installed and launched it. Select the Tools->Plugins menu option Select the Available Plugins Tab Check The CodenameOne Plugin click the install button below. Follow the Wizard instructions to install the plugin Installing Codename One In Eclipse # Startup Eclipse and click Help->Install New Software.
